title: Trump says he underwent an MRI examination with 'perfect' results
shortDescription:
U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday he had undergone an MRI examination, without saying why.
"It was perfect," he told reporters on board Air Force One en route to Tokyo.

title: Trump doesn't rule out 2028 run
shortDescription: Donald Trump said he would "love to do it" when asked if he would consider running for a third term in office in 2028.

title: Government shutdown hits day 27 as Trump in Asia: Live updates
shortDescription: The government shutdown is just days away from the one-month mark. With the president abroad, no major breakthroughs in Congress are expected.

title: Daily Briefing: The Democrats' new formula
shortDescription: Two moderate women could model Democrats' next phase. Here is the news to know on Monday.

title: 'Harsh terrain': Inside Columbia's First Amendment debates
shortDescription: Though they're navigating uncharted waters, one dean said "we haven't fundamentally changed anything about how we go about our responsibility."

title: See Trump kick off Asia trip with signature dance
shortDescription: Donald Trump danced with performers as he disembarked from Air Force One in Malaysia for the first stop of his tour in Asia.

title: Trump dances with performers in Malaysia
shortDescription: President Donald Trump danced and pumped his fists in front of Malaysian performers who were welcoming him for the first stop of his Asia trip.

title: US and China agree on critical trade framework ahead of Trump, Xi meeting
shortDescription: Top Chinese and U.S. officials agreed on a trade framework as President Donald Trump said he was confident of hashing out a deal with China's Xi Jinping.

title: Trump kicks off Asia tour in Malaysia
shortDescription: President Trump began his six-day trip to Asia overseeing a ceasefire deal between Cambodia and Thailand and meeting with leaders of ASEAN.

title: Asian countries welcome President Trump. See diplomacy, deals, more
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is on a six-day trip to Asia that Democrats say he should have scrapped amid the government shutdown. See his trip in photos.

title: 5 ways the White House ballroom plans changed, sometimes dramatically
shortDescription: On July 31, the White House put out an announcement, with renderings of a gold-accented lavish ballroom. But there were gaps in the details.

title: Mamdani's race for NYC mayor mobilizes Muslim, South Asian voters
shortDescription: The frontrunner is turning out Muslim and South Asian New Yorkers in historic numbers, while facing attacks on his faith and background.

title: 5 ways White House ballroom plans changed
shortDescription: President Trump always had lavish plans for his White House ballroom renovation, but the project has continued to balloon in scope.

title: What to know about Donald Trump's upcoming visit to Malaysia
shortDescription: The president will kick off his Asia tour in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, on Oct. 26 where he will participate in the 47th ASEAN Summit.

title: Trump announces 10% increase in tariffs on goods from Canada
shortDescription: Trump announced the increased tariffs on Oct. 25, referencing an anti-tariff ad aired by Ontario's government featuring a video of Ronald Reagan.

title: What to know about Trump's upcoming visit to South Korea
shortDescription: As the U.S. government shutdown enters its 25th day, President Donald Trump is embarking on a trip to Asia, where he will meet Xi Jinping.

title: Trump says Gaza stabilization force coming soon
shortDescription: “This should be an enduring peace,” President Trump told reporters when asked about the situation in Gaza after a refueling stop Saturday in Qatar.
